name: OpenAgentsControl (darrenhinde)
description: [项目级] AI agent framework for plan-first development workflows with approval-based execution. Multi-language support (TypeScript, Python, Go, Rust) with automatic testing, code review, and validation built for OpenCode。来源: https://github.com/darrenhinde/OpenAgentsControl

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI agent framework for plan-first development workflows with approval-based execution. Multi-language support (TypeScript, Python, Go, Rust) with automatic testing, code review, and validation built for OpenCode

来源: https://github.com/darrenhinde/OpenAgentsControl
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 2111

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
opencode --agent OpenCoder
> "Create a user dashboard with authentication and profile settings"
